home.title: Nomadic Guardians
home.subtitle: SeaPerch West Asia 2026
home.description: We are Nomadic Guardians, a school STEM team specializing in underwater robotics, participating in international SeaPerch West Asia 2026 competitions.

mission.title: Mission
mission.content: To advance underwater robotics education and innovation in Central Asia, representing our region on the international stage through excellence in engineering and teamwork.

goals.title: Goals
items: Design and build a competitive SeaPerch ROV
Excel in technical design and competition performance
Build international connections with other teams

plans.title: Plans
items: Share knowledge through articles and community outreach

sponsor.title: Our Sponsor
sponsor.description: We are grateful for the support of our sponsor, who enables us to participate in international competitions and advance STEM education.

articles.title: Articles
articles.subtitle: Engineering insights and team updates
articles.noArticles: No articles yet. Check back soon!
articles.author: Author

telegramBot.title: Telegram Bot
telegramBot.subtitle: Your SeaPerch Assistant
telegramBot.description: Our Telegram bot helps answer questions about the SeaPerch Manual Book. Ask it anything about rules, regulations, technical specifications, and competition guidelines.

features.title: Features
items: Answers questions about SeaPerch Manual Book
Offers guidance on ROV design and construction

examples.title: Example Questions
items: What are the size restrictions for the ROV?
What materials can I use for construction?
How is the Technical Design Report evaluated?

cad.title: CAD & Design Tools
cad.description: Software and resources for ROV design

hydrodynamics.title: Hydrodynamics Basics
hydrodynamics.description: Understanding underwater physics and fluid dynamics
